assetProfile.address2: No.18, Jinxiu Middle Road Pingshan District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Shenzhen Comix Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells office supplies in China and internationally. It offers filing products comprising indexes and dividers; view and ring binders; clip boards; display books; file cases; button and zipper bags; report, expanding, refill, box, lever arch, suspension, and pressure files; and name card and card holders. The company also provides automatic number machines, binder clips, book stands, clips and pins, colored clips and bands sets, DIY wooden products, file boxes and trays, file cabinets, key boxes, liquid glues and glue sticks, magnetic clip boxes, packing tapes, paper clips and staples, pen stands, punches, replacement blades, rulers and erasers, scissors, staple removers, staplers, steel scudding knifes, steel tape measures, transparent drawers, utility knifes, and other products. In addition, it offers pencil sharpeners, stapler sets, and little polo bear series; paper products, including notebooks, easy sticks, and copy and note papers; and writing instruments comprising gel-ink and ball pens, highlighters, pencils, permanent and whiteboard markers, fountain pens, and refills. Further, the company provides pocket, desktop, and office calculators; office equipment consisting of binding machines, laminating films, laminators, lubrication sachets, shredders, time recorders, and equipment accessories; and conference and presentation products, such as boards, laser pointers, white boards accessories, projection screens, and projector tables. Additionally, it offers air purifiers, half and face masks, alcohol spray disinfectants, hand sanitizing gels, display books, and portable air pillow makers. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Comix Stationery Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Comix Group Co., Ltd. in September 2014. Shenzhen Comix Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
